metadata.title: CVE-2023-6915 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A Null pointer dereference problem was found in ida_free in lib/idr.c inthe Linux Kernel. This issue may allow an attacker using this library tocause a denial of service problem due to a missing check at a functionreturn.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6915` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1057-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1057.65~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1021-aws-fips - 5.4.0-1119.129+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1021-aws-fips - 5.4.0-1119.129+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1022-azure-fips - 5.4.0-1124.131+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1022-azure-fips - 5.4.0-1124.131+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1021-gcp-fips - 5.4.0-1123.132+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1021-gcp-fips - 5.4.0-1123.132+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
